titleInfo.title: What should we value? a decade of questions: celebrating the tenth anniversary of the University Center for Human Values

name.namePart: University Center for Human Values (Princeton University)

mods.note: Frontispiece reads, 'This tenth anniversary volume is dedicated to Laurance S. Rockefeller '32, whose generosity made the University Center for Human Values possible, and to today's students, whose challenging questions inspire our search for greater understanding.

name.namePart: University Center for Human Values (Princeton University)
